article: Mr. Jackson began his trip last Saturday. Two days later when he was traveling in the country  by car , he saw a dog behind a man. As the car came near them, the dog suddenly started to  _  the road. Of course the car hit the poor animal and killed it. Mr. Jackson  _  his car and walked to the man. "I'm very  _  that this happened." he said. "How much shall I  _ ? Will ten dollars be enough?"  "Oh, yes." said the man. "Ten dollars will be  _  enough." Mr. Jackson put his hand into his pocket, but he only  found  five dollars in the pocket. "Sorry, sir, I've only _ five dollars." Said Mr. Jackson. "No problem. That's enough." the fat man replied. "Thanks a lot. That's very kind of you." Mr. Jackson thanked the fat man and  _  away. When the car went away, the fat man looked down at the dog and thought. "I want to know  _  dog it is."
